column1: # Title: Grid Connection Costs for Onshore Wind

# Units: cost_per_kW_km - $2010 USD per kW of capacity and km from grid (2010$/kW-km); rep_dist_for_bin - km (representative distance for distance to grid bins (distance_bin) used in energy/NREL_onshore_energy.csv)

# Comments:  Consistent with interconnection costs in CERF model (https://openresearchsoftware.metajnl.com/articles/10.5334/jors.227/); 774000 2010$/km per 251 MW wind farm (774000 / 251 / 1000 = 3.08 2010$ / kW-km). Distance based on reasonable representative values for existing distance to grid bins for onshore wind resource in energy/NREL_onshore_energy.csv.
# Source:  provided by Chris Vernon via email 2019.07.10; original source https://www.wecc.org/Reliability/2014_TEPPC_Transmission_CapCost_Report_B+V.pdf
